name: Back Sketch
description:
Have you ever thought about challenging your friend’s when it comes to drawing on their back? It’s time to take on the challenge of drawing on your friend’s backs and watching them copy what you draw on paper! Come and show your creative talent while also training your brain! 

Make your awesome ideas come to life when they are added in your own and your friend’s world after battling. But don’t forget, the most important part is to have fun!

What makes this game special?

 ✏ You can use your fingers to draw on both your friends back and, on your phone, 

✏ Your drawings come to life once every round has finished. 

✏ A hint system that will help you when you get stuck thinking of what possibly could have been drawn on your back 

✏ The possibility to save your masterpieces so you can share them with your friends.

 ✏ A ascending difficulty so the game won’t get boring

 ✏ Even if you feel like you can’t draw, your creativity will still allow you to win!
